de Garde Brewing.name: de Garde Brewing
de Garde Brewing.description: de Garde Brewing, located in Tillamook, OR is a small rural brewery specializing in many diverse styles of ales, but with a focus on spontaneous fermentations inspired by the European farmhouse traditions. Our craft draws on historic traditions and local experimentations. The choice is yours: To hold or to share. Show Less

La Cabra Brewing.name: La Cabra Brewing
La Cabra Brewing.description: Brewpub in Berwyn, PA focusing on delicious craft beer and Latin-inspired gastropub fare. Show Less

Nickel Brook Brewing Co..name: Nickel Brook Brewing Co.
Nickel Brook Brewing Co..description: John and Peter Romano built Nickel Brook Brewing Co. from the ground up, and since 2005, Nickel Brook has quickly developed a reputation for having a bold and diverse line up of beers. It is our goal to offer our customers an unrivalled experience designed to surpass their expectations. Our accumulation of an exceptional product line, partnered with superior service, has established a loyal following across the province.  Our purpose and objective here at Nickel Brook is to be a market leader in the quality and service we offer our customers in whatever community we participate. Cheers and enjoy! Show Less

New South Brewing.name: New South Brewing
New South Brewing.description: Opened in 1998, New South Brewing is the second oldest brewery in the state of South Carolina. Located just blocks from the beautiful Atlantic Ocean, New South brings quality ales and lagers to Myrtle Beach and the surrounding areas. New South Brewing currently cans our White Ale and Nut Brown Ale, and provides draft offerings to Myrtle Beach, Charleston, Columbia and Florence, SC. Besides our flagship beers - White Ale and Nut Brown Ale, New South brews our award-winning India Pale Ale, Lager, Red Ale, Oktoberfest, Java the Nut, Lily the Great Imperial Stout, Darkstar Porter, Bliss Imperial Black Ale, Dirty Myrtle Double IPA, Saison Blanc, Morning Dew Coffee Porter and many one-off beers available in the taproom only. If you visit Myrtle Beach, come visit our taproom, open Tu-Fr 4:30-7 and Sat Noon-4. We also offer paid tours with souvenir glass and samples. Also available at finer drinking and dining locations around the Grand Strand, as well as our cans in most grocery stores and bottle shops. Show Less

Aja Bryggeri.name: Aja Bryggeri
Aja Bryggeri.description: Aja bryggeri startet opp i oktober i 2014. Ordet "Aja" betyr kilde på samisk. Logoen er inspirert av et solhjul som er funnet på en helleristning. Sola er kilden til alt liv og slik henger logo og navn sammen. Bryggeriet holder til på Sundland i Drammen. Sundland er et område som består av flere vakre verneverdige bygninger bygget med røde mursteiner. Veldig passende for bryggerivirksomhet som lener seg på gamle tradisjoner.  Vi lager øl etter den belgiske bryggetradisjonen. Vi er opptatt av balanse i øl. Med det menes balanse mellom smakselementene som kommer fra gjærstammen, kornet og humlen i tillegg til eventuelle andre smakssettere. Vi er også opptatt av at bitterheten i ølet skal være harmonisk i forhold til de andre elementene i ølet, som for eksempel fylde og fruktighet.  Ølet lages på en skånsom måte, uten tilsetningsstoffer utenom råvarene. Det er ingen filtrering, sentrifugering eller pasteurisering. På Aja ettergjæres alle ølene på flaske siden det gir den beste kvaliteten. Show Less
